column1:
The  report of the  Examiner of Motor Vehicles was  produced  in 
evidence

and 
it  was 
admitted 
by 
the  prosecution  and 
the  defence  as  well.

According to  that report there were  few  defects in  the bus. 
It is true that

the  learned 
trial  Judge  has  said  in 
the  Judgment  that  there  were  no

defects  in  the  bus. 
Since  the  report  of Examiner  of  the  Motor  Vehicles
was admitted,  we  have  to  admit it without reservation.  According to  the
